title: Transfers, Minting and Burning of tokens can still happen in the `LiquidInfrastructureERC20::_endDistribution` function which may lead to draining all the tokens for distribution by a malicious attacker/node. Even when the ````LiquidInfrastructureERC20::_endDistribution` function is called, it doesn't end the distribution of tokens because of the wrong implementation of the wrong bool value for ``"LockedForDistribution" in the require statement.
